page.title: 12CHILDREN'S GAMES (2 of 2)
page.content:
We own different sorts of{computers, including the Sinclair Spectrum, B.B.C.'B' and the Commodore. The games we play on the computer include Donkey Kong, Decathlon, Space Invaders and Pac-Man.
In{Pac-Man}you have a little thing like a letter 'C' and you have to use it to eat little spots. If you eat a power pill you eat the ghosts, but beware because they can eat you.
In{Space Invaders}you have to shoot down different creatures or space craft before they manage to land. You score different points for shooting down the different types of invaders. Some children play these games for hours.
